plot: Antidote 15 is a web series that follows Anita, a college student who is poisoned and has fifteen hours to follow a set of directions in order to find the antidote.
plot_en: Antidote 15 is a web series that follows Anita, a college student who is poisoned and has fifteen hours to follow a set of directions in order to find the antidote.
plot_es: Antidote 15 is a web series that follows Anita, a college student who is poisoned and has fifteen hours to follow a set of directions in order to find the antidote.
title: Antidote 15
